attributes.action: restrict the access of prisoners to social networking sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There has been an increased amount of reports of prisoners using social networking sites in order to terrorise their victimns or to "boast" about life in prison. 
We feel that prisoners should have restricted or supervised access to sites which allow them to do this in order for their victims to be allowed to live in peace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
